TEXT.TITLE: CARIBOU ENERGY REVERSE SPLIT APPROVED
TEXT.BODY: <Caribou Energy Inc> said shareholders have approved a one-for-100 reverse split that will take effect by tomorrow and the company has changed its name to <Texas Petroleum Corp>. Reuter
